content:
Next.js Pokedex is a small app that list pokemons build on top of Next.js and Tailwind CSS
Stack:
Next.jsTailwind CSShttps://nextjs-pokedex-navy.vercel.app/
https://github.com/salvarezm/nextjs-pokedex
Pokedex Mobile versionPokedex Desktop version
summary: Next.js Pokedex is a small app that list pokemons build on top of Next.
title: Next.js Pokedex

content: Welcome to my personal site, where I store my projects such as sample projects, proofs of concept, Hello Worlds, and anything shareable or showable. By the way, I’m a Capybara.

content:
React Pokedex is a SPA build in react that use poke-api to get a list of pokemons and detail from them
Stack:
Reactreact-reduxRTK Querytheme-uihttps://salvarez-pokedex.netlify.app/
https://github.com/salvarezm/pokedex-webapp
Pokedex Mobile versionPokedex Desktop version
summary: React Pokedex is a SPA build in react that use poke-api to get a list of pokemons and detail from them
title: React Pokedex
